meta_description: Presenting local, national, and international art in the Katzen Arts Center at 4400 Massachusetts Ave in DC.

Learn more [about the Museum](/web/20260105011341/https://www.american.edu/cas/museum/about.cfm) and plan [your visit](/web/20260105011341/https://www.american.edu/cas/museum/visiting.cfm). 

The AU Museum is currently closed while we install new artwork. We will re-open February 7. Check out our [upcoming exhibitions](/web/20260105011341/https://www.american.edu/cas/museum/upcoming.cfm)!
